item.title: My Mac Dev Setup and Favorite Tools
item.description: This post is an incomplete collection of notes on how I setup and use my computer and tools for development, and a few tips & tricks. I’d love to hear your thoughts, ideas and additional tips in the comments below! See also this post about how I setup my Terminal and Bash. Contents Mac setup Keyboard shortcuts Browser Terminal & Shell Docker for Node.js and Python Visual Studio Code Github tips & tricks Mac setup General system setup Full Disk Encryption with FileVault (if you don’t have Apple silicon or an Apple T2 security chip) Enable backups with TimeMachine (use a dedicated SSD, and encrypt the backup disk with TimeMachine) Install all system updates Use a password manager!
